title: Sales Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions: Position: Student Assistant Kindergarten Location: Eschborn, Germany Tasks: Childcare, educational processes, parent cooperation, integration of children, hygiene compliance Qualifications: Studying educational sciences, enjoyment of working with children, flexibility, empathy, and creativity.
Interview Questions: Position: Student Assistant Kindergarten Location: Eschborn, Germany Tasks: Childcare, educational processes, parent cooperation, integration of children, hygiene compliance Qualifications: Studying educational sciences, enjoyment of working with children, flexibility, empathy, and creativit?

title: Athletic Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions: The 1st interview was a phone screen. The 2nd interview was a zoom call with a coach and the assistant to the AD. The 3nd interview consisted of all of the coaches and the Athletic director. All interviews happened within a week. I never heard back from them.
Interview Questions: All interview questions were related to how you would deal in certain situations and/or skills.

title: Student Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions: Easy light just be yourself snd bring your resume and make sure you seem committed and drive and you will get the job no problem. Good luck everybody!! You’ll do great
Interview Questions: How many years experience I have

title: Intetn Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions:
Most of the questions were behavioral based questions and situational questions and no technical questions were asked during the interview
The questions were quite easy but the overall experience was neutral
Interview Questions: What challenge did you face

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College (Bronxville, NY) in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: thoughtful and relaxed interview. They tried to get to know my work experience, strengths and my personality.  I was told about the department and the role I was interviewing for.
Interview Questions: How did you handle a highly sensitive situation.

title: Senior Ambassador Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College (Yonkers, NY) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very simple process, if you apply then they call to set up an interview within the next week. When there, they sit you down in one of the interview rooms and ask you the interview questions. Very conversational, but they're expecting you to be a face for the college, so give a good presentation, speak clearly and respectfully, but also honestly. Nobody loves everything about college and usually, they respect a realistic look at the school if it's largely positive. Asking them thoughtful questions about the job is definitely encouraged. Afterward they tell you they'll get back to you soon, and you receive an email within a week or two, generally.
Interview Questions: why you came to SLC in the first place, what you study, why you're interested in the position, what some of your favorite facts about SLC are, your favorite places to be on campus, why you enjoy SLC, what you would stress to incoming families, if you have any concerns about interviewing students, etc.

title: Admissions Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College (New York, NY) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: detailed and personalized true to the ethos marketed for institution... def looking for niche fit and willing to let the conversation build to your interest area caring as a human being to human being. never feels like speaking with a robot. wonderful people all around
Interview Questions:
why do you want the job
why are you an ideal candidate / differentiated from the app crowd

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College (Bronxville, NY) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was a relaxed meeting with the department, then a  one on one with the department head.  It was informative as well as asking about my experience.  I was given an overview of the tasks and department organization first.  I was then asked specific questions about my previous experience and how it related to the job specifics.
Interview Questions: How did I handle sensitive issues in my previous job.

title: Assistant Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions: The interview process took approximately three months. The overall experience was positive. The interview questions were a bit difficult. Everyone was extremely nice and welcoming. The culture seemed very positive and relaxed.
Interview Questions: What previous experience can you bring to Sarah Lawrence

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Sarah Lawrence College
Interview Descriptions: One of the best interview experiences I have had most likely because the college is based on conference-style and small classes.  It lasted for 3 hours.  I had the chance to visit classes and take a tour of the campus during my initial visit.
Interview Questions: What is your experience with html?
